name: Svevenka

specials.name: Nymph’s Beauty
specials.traits: aura, emotion, enchantment, incapacitation, mental, primal, visual
specials.description:
Trigger: creature comes within 30ft of %.
Effect: DC [dc]. On a failed save, the target is immobilized in awe for 1 minute.

specials.name: Focus Beauty
specials.traits: emotion, enchantment, incapacitation, mental, primal, visual
specials.description: DC [dc] On a failed save, if the target was already affected by %'s beauty, the target suffers the effects of a failed save against charm.

specials.name: Nature Empathy
specials.description: % can use Diplomacy to Make an Impression on and make very simple Requests of animals and plants.

specials.name: Ice Meld
specials.description:
% touches ice within her domain of enough volume to contain her and merges into it for as long as she wishes. She can Cast a Spell while inside as long as the spell doesn’t require a line of effect outside the ice. She can hear, but not see, what’s going on outside the ice. She can enter or exit her extradimensional domain from any ice in her domain. She can Dismiss this effect.
Significant physical damage dealt to the ice where she entered expels % from the ice and deals 3d6 damage to her. Passwall expels % without dealing damage.
If % uses this ability on her bonded area of ice, she instead enters an extradimensional living space within; Ice Meld gains the extradimensional trait. % can bring up to eight other creatures with her when entering her home within her bonded area. % can still be expelled from this space as above.

specials.name: Icy Touch
specials.description: %'s touch and attacks she makes with metallic weapons deal +1d6 points of cold damage. Anyone who takes this additional cold damage must succeed at a DC 30 Fortitude save or be slowed 1.

specials.name: Exude Ice
specials.description: % can exude a circle of slippery ice in a 10-foot-radius spread centered on her. This ice remains in the affected area, melting away as normal for the ambient temperature. This functions as per the Grease spell though is not limited to just the ground.

specials.name: Ice Mastery
specials.description: % never slips or slides on ice unless she wishes, and can climb icy surfaces as though affected by a spider climb spell.

specials.name: Cold Aura
specials.description: % emits an aura of cold in a 10-foot radius. Any creature in this range takes 2d6 points of cold damage per round (DC 30 Fort for half).

morespells.name: Primal Innate
spells: shape ice (at will), ice form (at will, as tree shape)
baleful polymorph, true seeing, chain lightning
earthbind, haste, animal vision, wall of thorns
animal messenger, faerie fire, calm emotions
fleet step, gust of wind, negate aroma
detect magic, guidance, light, ray of frost, stabilize

strikes.name: +2 Greater Striking Dagger
strikes.traits: Magical, Agile, Finesse, Thrown 10 ft., Versatile S
strikes.damage: 3d12+8 piercing + icy touch (1d6 cold plus slowed 1 DC30)

strikes.name: Icicles
strikes.traits: conjuration, cold, primal, range increment 60 feet

languages: Common, Elven, Sylvan; speak with animals
